subject: The "official" guide to building ghost box radios--the essentials.
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
All one has to do is follow the datasheet for the chip, then use this as a
guide for converting to varactor tuning. I know this works for the TA2003P
and th LA1816, and it should work with the TDA7000, but I haven't gotten
that far yet.

 F-S

All one has o do is ollow he da ashee o he chip, hen use his as a guide o con e ing o a ac o uning. I know his wo ks o he TA2003P and h LA1816, and i should wo k wi h he TDA7000, bu I ha en' go en ha a ye . 

 
 F-S
